Today in County Clare, it's a quiet day with 2 ft @5s W swell and fresh 12 mph SSW winds. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 4 ft @8s WNW swell and 15 mph NW winds, offering some workable options at spots like Doolin Point and Lahinch Beach. The day after looks even better with 4 ft @9s WNW swell and light 4 mph SE winds, making for clean surf at Lahinch. Best: day after.
